item.description:
GAME ON!

Hope to see some of you for the FINAL broomball game of the season. We will meet at Blake's Tavern beforehand for some Scooby Snacks and drinks around 8PM if you want.

Please bring some sort of helmet and gloves as I will provide the sticks and balls. If you have knee pads and shin pads then those may be a good idea but not mandatory.

Lastly, if you could bring 1 white and 1 black tee shirt for teams then that would help as well as $10.00.

Hope to see you out there.

Call me @ 401-441-0871 if you have any questions.

Thanks.

Neil
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of the ticket booth at 9:45PM. Just look for the people with brooms in their hands.
item.name: Pick-up Broomball game
